movie.title: Year of the Comet
movie.description_intro: What seemed to be a simple little trip becomes an international chase, when an extremely rare bottle of wine's discovered (bottled during the appearance of the Great Comet of 1811). Margaret Harwood's sent to retrieve it so it can be auctioned. Oliver Plexico is her travel guide/bodyguard, because there's other people who desperately want this bottle, and they'll stop at nothing to get it.
movie.description_full: What seemed to be a simple little trip becomes an international chase, when an extremely rare bottle of wine's discovered (bottled during the appearance of the Great Comet of 1811). Oliver Plexico is her travel guide/bodyguard, because there's other people who desperately want this bottle, and they'll stop at nothing to get it.

movies.title: Black Water
movies.summary: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.
movies.description_full: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.
movies.synopsis: A deep cover operative awakens to find himself imprisoned in a CIA black site on a submarine.

movies.title: The Scorpion King 2: Rise of a Warrior
movies.title_english: The Scorpion King 2: Rise of a Warrior
movies.title_long: The Scorpion King 2: Rise of a Warrior (2008)
movies.summary: In Ancient Akkad, Mathayus grows up as the proud son of Ashur, a captain in the world-renowned military corps of Black Scorpions, first-rate bodyguards, most of which are sent to courts wide away. By objecting to young Mathayus joining the corps, Ashur incurs the undying enmity of ruthless generalissimo Sargon, gets killed and the orphaned knave is shipped off to a desolate training camp for six years by king Hammurabi's clemency. When he returns as a Black Scorpio, Sargon has bloodily seized the throne and demands cruel proof of blind loyalty. Mathayus refuses, becoming a chased hero. With youth friends, the resourceful Greek Pollux and various mercenary warriors, he embarks on a daring quest to obtain a legendary sword from Sargon's magical ally, the war-goddess Astarte.

movies.title: The Mystery of D.B. Cooper
movies.summary: A documentary that looks at the well-known case, which is largely regarded as the greatest unsolved heist in American history.
movies.description_full: A documentary that looks at the well-known case, which is largely regarded as the greatest unsolved heist in American history.
movies.synopsis: A documentary that looks at the well-known case, which is largely regarded as the greatest unsolved heist in American history.

movies.title: The Jungle Book 2
movies.summary: Jungle boy Mowgli (voiced by Osment) decides to forsake civilized village life for the "bare necessities" of the wild with his old friends. However, the evil tiger Shere Khan is looking for a little payback after Mowgli's last adventure. Trouble's a-brewing!
